alert.note: Alert for Hill; Limestone; McLennan (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern McLennan, northwestern Limestone and southeastern Hill Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 559 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near West, or 12 miles north of Lacy-Lakeview, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Waco, Bellmead, Lacy-Lakeview, West, Coolidge, Hallsburg, Tradinghouse Creek Reservoir, Northcrest, Gholson, Abbott, Leroy, Mount Calm, Ross, Penelope, Birome, Watt, Elm Mott, Tours, Prairie Hill and Axtell. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 339 and 361. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
